Method.Title: Open Lock (B)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs LOCK ID, USER ID, TOUCH KEY ID, DATE, HOUR, TIME BLOCK and LOCK STATUS.

Method.Title: Open Lock No Touch Key (B)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs LOCK ID, USER ID, TIME, DATE and TIME BLOCK.

Method.Title: Open Lock Now (1B)
Method.Description: This command generates an operation code to open the lock using the inputs LOCK ID and USER ID.

Method.Title: Close Code (B)
Method.Description: This command will close an active operation code that matches the input LOCK ID, OPERATOR CODE and OPERATION RESULT.

Method.Title: Close Code Via A Seal (B)
Method.Description: This command will close an operation code using the B Seal value.
